articles.author: SAGAR MEGHANI Associated Press
articles.title: Military command ready to track Santa, and everyone can follow along - ABC News
articles.description: The military will track Santa with the tech they use "to keep ... America safe."
articles.content:
WASHINGTON -- As children around the world eagerly await Santas arrival on Christmas, the military is ready to track him and see if hes using any new technology.
Armed with radars, sensors and aircr… [+2266 chars]
